author: Natural England
title: Corporate report: Natural England's Strategy: Recovering Nature for Growth, Health and Security
text:
Natural England's Strategy: Recovering Nature for Growth, Health and Security
'Recovering Nature for Growth, Health and Security', Natural Englandâ€™s strategy.
Applies to England
Documents
Details
Our strategy sets out how Natural England will move beyond protection to systemic, large-scale recovery of nature. It focuses on nature recovery contributing to housing delivery, public health, and national security, recognising nature as essential to sustaining growth and a healthy society.
Case studies
The case studies give an example of each outcome in action:
Underpinning evidence
The underpinning evidence shows the key evidence for each of our strategic outcomes:
